Windlord::

Windlord follow him and said "Our situation is worse than you can 
belive" and he added "A faction named Cybers wants get an alliance 
with us and Alliance against to factions that I've never heard: 
Autobots and Decepticons. If we refuse that, we could be menaced by 
Alliance and Cybers... Our situation is really bad, Hot ROd, if 
maximals don't help us we're lost "


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> "Ok, Windlord, follow me. We'll go find Iron Raptor." He started 
walking
> back towards the city.
